What is Cyber Security?

Cyber security is the practice of protecting computers, networks, and data from digital attacks, theft, or damage. As technology grows, so do cyber threats, making security more important than ever.

Common Cyber Threats

  • Phishing Attacks
  • Viruses & Malware
  • Identity Theft
  • Ransomware
  • Data Breaches

Cyber Safety Tips

  • Use strong and unique passwords
  • Enable two-factor authentication
  • Avoid clicking unknown links or attachments
  • Keep your software updated
  • Use antivirus and firewall protection
